DOC.brief_summary: The patient randomize 3 group : patient undergo ionic silver-containing dressing ( ISD ) ( Group 1 ) , undergo Mupirocin ointment application ( MOA ) ( Group 2 ) use conventional dressing ( Group 3 ) surgical wound finish elective colorectal surgery .
DOC.brief_title: Total Occlusive Ionic Silver-containing Dressing v Mupirocin Ointment Application v Conventional Dressing Elective Colorectal Surgery : Effect Incisional Surgical Site Infection
DOC.criteria: Diagnosis colorectal neoplasm plan undergo elective surgery curative aim . Open surgical approach Anastomotic leak Mortality Lost followup
